          <title>
            <string language="en">Formation of the Solar System</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung des Solarsystems</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation du système solaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação do sistema solar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione del sistema solare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός του ηλιακού συστήματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación de la Sistema Solar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the formation of the Solar System from swirling cloud of dust and gas.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravitational force</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solar system</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Anordnung des 
Solarsystems von wirbelnder Wolke des Staubes und des Gases.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la formation du 
système solaire du nuage tourbillonnant de la poussière et du gaz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a formação do sistema 
solar da nuvem rodando da poeira e do gás.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la formazione del 
sistema solare dalla nube di turbine di polvere e di gas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το σχηματισμό του ηλιακού
συστήματος από το στροβιλιμένος σύννεφο της σκόνης και 
αέριο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la formación de la 
Sistema Solar de la nube que remolina del polvo y del gas.</string>
          </description>
